other.title: Tip #1
other.text:
The last greatest hero has fallen, and the quest called for adventurers.

You're on a 7-day journey to the most challenging dungeon in the realm.

other.title: Tip #2
other.text:
On your journey, you'll meet a lot of obstacles. Dungeon is the last one for you to worry about.

It's always wise to do things within your abilities.

other.title: Tip #3
other.text:
Every outcome of an event can be determined by your Combat, Physique, Wit, and Charm.

Your valuables (Food, Herbs, Coins, Accessory, and Weapon) sometimes also come into play.

other.title: Tip #4
other.text:
Combat affects how effective you can use melee and ranged weapons.

Physique decides your fitness and how well you can heal yourself.

other.title: Tip #5
other.text:
Wit reflects your knowledge and your level of paranoia.

Charm influences your persuasion on others and morale.

other.title: Tip #6
other.text:
Your weapon plays an important role on your survival on your journey.

When you choose to fight your enemy, the more damage you can do, the more likely you'll win.

other.title: Tip #7
other.text:
All of your weapons have limited usage and a chance of breaking.

It's wise when not to engage your enemies when your weapon is close to its end.

other.title: Tip #8
other.text:
Once you deplete your weapon, you'll have to fight with your fists until you find another weapon.

If you're confident about your Combat skills, losing a weapon might not bother you.

other.title: Tip #9
other.text: Your accessory will give you bonus attribute points or other magical benefits, such as increase the amount of coins you can find.

other.title: - The End -
other.text: You have died on the journey to defeat the dungeon. Your remains are soon to be found by other adventurers. May what you left help the next conquer the greatest dungeon.

other.title: - The End -
other.text: You have defeated the most dangerous dungeon and returned in one piece. More adventurers are inspired by your victory and determination. They are soon to be on the journey to the greatest dungeon.

other.title: - The End -
other.text: You gave up the journey to defeat the greatest dungeon. What you have accomplished is nothing compared to your failure and the lack of determination. May you have the courage to conquer your greatest enemy.

looting.title: EXPLORING THE @LOC
looting.text: After an exploring attempt, you found:

looting.title: EXPLORING THE @LOC
looting.text: After some exploring, you found a weapon:

looting.title: EXPLORING THE @LOC
looting.text: After some exploring, you found a piece of accessory:

travel.title: The Death Crossroad
travel.text:
In front of you presents two separate paths to different destinations.

You decide to go to:

travel.title: Raiders In A Distance
travel.text:
You noticed some raiders are handing around in your route.

You decide to:

result.text: The detour took longer than you expected.
You approach the raiders without caution. They knocked you down and took all your possessions and weapon.
You won the fight.
You used objects in the environment for you advantage and successfully went through the area without being seen.
You persuaded the raiders that you're a lonely traveller trying to pass. They let you pass with accpetance.

travel.title: IT'S AN AMBUSH
travel.text: A group of raiders ambushed you, and they demand half of your valuable items.

result.text: The raiders quickly took off with half of your possesions.
You proposed a really compelling compromise. The raiders agreed to only take half of your food and coins.
You suspected the ambush and gave them a decoy bag. While the raiders are searching for valuable items, you already took off with all your stuff.
The raiders beat ypu up before taking all of your stuff.
You won the fight
You convinced them that you have nothing valuable to them. The raiders left you feeling disappointed.
You ran away with your full speed. The raiders couldn't even catch up and gave up very soon
You demonstrated a few karate moves and didn't impress the raiders. They tried to take you down, but GUESS WHAT? The raiders couldn't stand a chance against you.

result.text: The raiders quickly took off with your weapon.
You suspected the ambush and gave them a decoy weapon. While the raiders are testing the fake weapon, you already are nowhere to be found.
The raiders beat ypu up before taking all of your stuff.

travel.title: A Trader Doing Bussiness
travel.text: A trader carrying a enormous backpack stands besides the road asking for a trade.

travel.title: Villagers In Need
travel.text:
A village is under attack by a spawn of undeads. They're asking for help.

You decide to:

result.text: You walked away.
You helped the villagers defend the village, but they had lost too much. They couldn't offer you anything.
You gave the villagers an effective plan and evacuted everyone to safety. They offered you some coins.
You were unstoppable. You fought off all the undeads and most of the villagers survived. They offered you some food and coins.

travel.title: A Deadly Creature
travel.text: As you're walking, you get bitten by a venomous snake. It is no time to be careless. Any wrong step could increase the damage has been done to your body.

result.text:
You didn't know anything about treating a snake bite. Luckily, the venom was not so deadly.

You lost some health but you'll be fine.

You knew what exactly had to be done. You successfully remove the venom from your system.

You'll be on the road for no time.

You tried to use the herbs to combat the venom. And it worked!

You'll be on the road for no time.

No one came to help you. Luckily, the venom was not so deadly.

You lost some health but you'll be fine.
An adventure heard your help and came. They treated you professionally. You also learned a few things. You'll be on the road for no time.

travel.title: The Bag Under the Tree
travel.text:
You discover a bag sitting under the tree. There's no one around. Could it be abandoned or left by someone who's nearby?

You decide to:

result.text:
As soon as you picked up the bag, the owner returned. They were not happy about it. You initiated a fight with an adventurer.

You lost and ran away.

As soon as you picked up the bag, the owner returned. They were not happy about it. You initiated a fight with an adventurer.

You won and took the bag.
As soon as you picked up the bag, the owner returned. They tried to catch you, but you ran so fast that they lost you in a minute. You found some valuables in the bag.

travel.title: Adventurer's Treasure
travel.text:
As you're walking, you find a stash of valuables left by a previous adventurer.

You find:

result.text: You obtained some herbs and coins!
You read the book and learned a little bit of everything.

travel.title: Unexpected Crawler
travel.text:
A wondering crawler discovers you around the corner and prepares to charge.

You decide to:

result.text: You tried to run away, but the crawler was too fast. You had to give up half of your valuables to get away.
You outran the the crawler. It soon gave up chasing you.
You tossed a rock, and it distracted the crawler. You managed to get away.

You initiated the fight with the crawler.

You lost.

You initiated the fight with the crawler.

You won.

travel.title: It's A Crawler Nest
travel.text:
You discover a crawler nest. It's better not to distrub them.

You decide to:

result.text:
You wake up the resting crawlers. You initiated a fight with crawlers.

You lost.

You wake up the resting crawlers. You initiated a fight with crawlers.

You won.

travel.text:
You discover an undead wondering around in the area.

You decide to:

result.text:
You initiated the fight with the undead.

You lost.

You initiated the fight with the undead.

You won.

You decide to:

result.text:
You wake up the sleeping undeads. You initiated a fight with undeads.

You lost.

You wake up the sleeping undeads. You initiated a fight with undeads.

You won.

travel.title: Wondering Beast
travel.text: You discover a beast wondering around in the area. You decide to:

result.text: The beast smelled your scent and found you sneaking. When you started to run, it tore your bag with a big hole. You lost half of your valuables.
You know how to cover your scent around the beast. You sneaked past it.

You initiated the fight with the beast.

You lost.

You initiated the fight with the beast.

You won.

travel.text:
You discover a beast pack hunting for prey. It's better not to distrub them.

You decide to:

result.text: The beasts smelled your scent and found you sneaking. When you started to run, it got your bag. You lost all of your valuables.
You know how to cover your scent around the beasts. You sneaked past them.

You initiated the fight with the beasts.

You lost.

You initiated the fight with the beasts.

You won.

travel.title: Warlock's Space
travel.text:
You walk in on a hostile warlock performing a ritual.

You decide to:

result.text: The warlock said you were a coward.

You initiated a fight with the warlock.

You lost.

You initiated a fight with the warlock.

You won.

explore.title: A Random Adventurer
explore.text: You discovered an adventurer exploring the same place. They didn't see you though.

result.text: Everything went okay. You and the adventurer even exchanged dungeon tips!
You couldn't trust the adventurer, so you quickly took off without throughly exploring the area.

explore.title: An Unwelcome Explorer
explore.text: During your exploration, you noticed a raider a few meters from you without knowing you're there.

result.text: You walked away quietly.
The raider had the faster move and defeated you with ease. They took off with all your valuables.
You won the fight.
You knocked down the raider with one hit and took away their valuables.

explore.title: The Storm Is Coming
explore.text: An unseasonably severe and perilous storm is now upon you. It's better to stay inside.

result.text: You were not prepared for this storm. The wind blew away half of your valuables.
You know exactly what to do during a storm. You tied yourself and your valuables to a tree. And the wind had no chance ruinning your adventure.
You set up a fire and waited until the storm passed.

explore.title: Dungeon Guardian
explore.text:
As you're getting deeper into the dungeon. A guardian blocks your way.

If you run away, you'll be asked to leave the dungeon.

result.text:
You initiated a fight with the guardian.

You lost.

You initiated a fight with the guardian.

You won.

If you run away, you'll be asked to leave the dungeon.

You lost.

rest.title: Another Day In A Quiet Place
rest.text:
As the sun is going down, you find a quiet spot for resting throught the night. There's no sign of other dangers, but you can't be so sure of it.

You decided to:

result.text: You ate some food and went to sleep. The next day will be full of challenges again.

You stayed up all night, but there was nothing from the dark trying to harm you. You feel very tired the next day.

However, it gave you time to think about all your mistakes.

rest.title: A Busy Tavern
rest.text:
Just before the sun falls, you find a crowded tavern in a nearby town. It's full of people. There's also a room for rent.

8 coins a night.

result.text: You didn't have enough money to rent the room. You left the tavern when it was closed. You couldn't find somewhere to sleep and stayed up all night. You feel tired the next day.
The owner saw you as an inspiring, selfless adventure, doing good deeds for others and sacrificing yourself. They gave you the room for free.
You went to the room, ate some food and went to sleep. The next day will be full of challenges again.
You didn't have enough money to buy anything. You left the tavern when it was closed. You couldn't find somewhere to sleep and stayed up all night. You feel tired the next day.
You know your limit and didn't have fun all night. You went to your room when you felt tired. The next day will be full of challenges again.
You drank some beer and gambled until the tavern was closed. You fell asleep in the tavern. But you still feel very tired the next day.

rest.title: An Abandoned Cabin
rest.text:
Just right before the nightfall, you find a cabin. It appears to be unoccupied and great for one night.

You decided to:

result.text: During the night, you heard some scary sounds. Suddenly, some funitures started to move by themselves. The cabin is haunted! You got so scary that you couldn't have a good sleep.

During the night, you heard some scary sounds. Suddenly, some funitures started to move by themselves. The cabin is haunted!

But you couldn't care less, you had a decent sleep.

You decided not to go in the cabin. However, you couldn't find anywhere suitable for resting outside. You spent all night searching for a place.

You're very tired the next day.
You decided not to go in the cabin. However, you couldn't find anywhere suitable for resting. Luckily, you found a great camping spot under a tree and slept through the night.

rest.title: Someone's House
rest.text:
As the night falls, you find a lit up house in front of you. The owner agrees to allow you to stay for one night in a room for 10 coins.

You decided to:

result.text:
You couldn't pay the owner, so they left you outside. However, they did spare you some food.

You stayed outside without a sleep until the next morning.
You convinced the owner to allow you to sleep on the floor for free. It was not very comfortable, but at least you had some sleep.

You paid the owner, and they invited you inside. They prepared some food for you and gave you some leftovers.

The room was really nice. You had a good sleep.

You decided not to stay in the house.

You stayed outside without a sleep until the next morning.

The owner was nice enough to give you some food.

You stayed outside without a sleep until the next morning.

rest.title: An Inn in the Town
rest.text:
Just before the sun falls, you find a popular inn in a nearby town. It's fancy. There's also a room for rent.

12 coins a night.

result.text:
You didn't have the money for one night. You slept outside of the inn.

You feel very tired the next day.
The owner saw you as an inspiring, selfless adventure, doing good deeds for others and sacrificing yourself. They gave you the room for free.
The room was really fancy. You ate some food and went to sleep. The next day will be full of challenges again.
You didn't enter the inn. However, there was no place for you to sleep in this town. You stayed outside without a sleep until the next morning.
